name: neurolearn
description: AI-powered educational platform for neurodiverse students

scripts.install:all: npm run install:frontend && npm run install:backend && npm run install:ai
scripts.install:frontend: cd frontend/student-app && npm install && cd ../parent-dashboard && npm install && cd ../educator-portal && npm install && cd ../shared && npm install
scripts.install:backend: cd backend/auth-service && npm install && cd ../learning-engine && npm install && cd ../content-service && npm install && cd ../analytics-service && npm install
scripts.install:ai: cd ai-services/adaptation-engine && pip install -r requirements.txt && cd ../behavior-analysis && pip install -r requirements.txt && cd ../content-generation && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:ai"
scripts.dev:frontend: concurrently "cd frontend/student-app && npm run dev" "cd frontend/parent-dashboard && npm run dev" "cd frontend/educator-portal && npm run dev"
scripts.dev:backend: concurrently "cd backend/auth-service && npm run dev" "cd backend/learning-engine && npm run dev" "cd backend/content-service && npm run dev" "cd backend/analytics-service && npm run dev"
scripts.dev:ai: concurrently "cd ai-services/adaptation-engine && python main.py" "cd ai-services/behavior-analysis && python main.py" "cd ai-services/content-generation && python main.py"
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.build:frontend: cd frontend/student-app && npm run build && cd ../parent-dashboard && npm run build && cd ../educator-portal && npm run build
scripts.build:backend: cd backend/auth-service && npm run build && cd ../learning-engine && npm run build && cd ../content-service && npm run build && cd ../analytics-service && npm run build
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend && npm run test:ai
scripts.test:frontend: cd frontend/student-app && npm test && cd ../parent-dashboard && npm test && cd ../educator-portal && npm test && cd ../shared && npm test
scripts.test:backend: cd backend/auth-service && npm test && cd ../learning-engine && npm test && cd ../content-service && npm test && cd ../analytics-service && npm test
scripts.test:ai: cd ai-services/adaptation-engine && python -m pytest && cd ../behavior-analysis && python -m pytest && cd ../content-generation && python -m pytest
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:ai

author: NeuroLearn Team
